snippet: Buyers now expect their cars to have the capabilities of their smartphones, so automakers have complied. To gauge the systems, Sam Grobart, Tool Kit columnist, spent time with five cars from automakers in the forefront of telematics.
abstract: Buyers now expect their cars to have the capabilities of their smartphones, so automakers have complied. To gauge the systems, Sam Grobart, Tool Kit columnist, spent time with five cars from automakers in the forefront of telematics.

headline.main: Touch, Speak, Tap: Taking 5 Connected Cars for a Spin
